amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the funding for Diplomatic and Consular Programs in the Department of State by $7.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the amount available for Diplomatic and Consular Programs by $7,800,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Doggett amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 221 (Roll no. 47).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Doggett.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Doggett amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 221 (Roll no. 47).
